verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] expected to sign the bill to ease regulations on all but the largest banks .
President Donald Trump is [V: expected] [ARG1: to sign the bill to ease regulations on all but the largest banks] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is expected to [V: sign] [ARG1: the bill to ease regulations on all but the largest banks] .
President Donald Trump is expected to sign the bill to [V: ease] [ARG1: regulations on all but the largest banks] .
